ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] How the hell do I take someone off moderated status?
ygData.msgSnippet: yeah. I saw that before. That only does the entire group setting. it doesnt give me the option to make individual members unmoderated. I know there used to be
ygData.messageBody:
yeah. I saw that before. That only does the entire group setting. it doesnt' give me the option to make individual members unmoderated. I know there used to be a way to do that but I can't seem to find it.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2006-01-13, 09:44:00 you wrote: =======

>Su...
>
>Go to "management" (left-hand column of group home page), then choose "messages" from "group settings" (options available on right-hand side of screen). Then click on "edit" next to "posting and archives". You can change it from there.
>
>Hope that helps!
>
>Jennifer
>Athiarna Aoibhell
>51 Monk, Disciple
>Bristlebane
>
>^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^ ^v^
>"October Country...that country where it is always turning late in the year...that country whose people are autumn people, thinking only autumn thoughts." ----Ray Bradbury
>
>
>----- Original Message ----
>From: Su <suceress@...>
>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Sent: January 13, 2006 5:01:48 AM
>Subject: [EverQuest] How the hell do I take someone off moderated status?
>
>There are a few people that have been posting well but it still has
>them on moderated status and I cannot for the life of me find the
>command in stupid yahoo to remove individual people from moderated
>status. I have looked all through Management, Messages, Members,
>Posting, etc and cannot find the bloody thing.
>Yahoo's help page was not very helpful. It didn't say where to find the
>option. UGH!
>I apologize to the people who have been trying to post and have to
>wait. It's pissing me off that I can't find the thing to unmoderate...
>luv,
>-Su
